name: Zombie Mania (Rookie Studio)
description:
Zombie Mania is a wave type zombie shooter, with ten different waves. Find health and ammo pickups to boost your chance of survival. The game check players performance in the pervious waves and then grant assess to the next wave based on the performance, this makes it impossible to reach the tenth wave. This is our first game and we hope you enjoy it.

Use WASD  or Arrow Keys for movement

Press R for reloading

Left Click to shoot

Right Click to aim

1 or Mouse Scroll wheel for switching weapons

TIPS : Ammo and Health pickups are located in each level. Find them to boost your chance of survival
